metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3596 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Polipo before 1.0.4.1 suffers from a DoD vulnerability via specially-crafted HTTP POST / PUT request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-3596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

polipo - 1.1.1-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: polipo package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-7').
